globals.color_palette: deep blacks, electric blues, stark whites

sequence.description: An empty, dark room is revealed. A single box sits in the center.
sequence.lighting: A single soft spotlight from above illuminates the box, leaving the corners of the room in shadow.

elements.name: room
elements.description: An empty {{room_type}} with dark wood floors.

elements.name: shoebox
elements.description: A matte black {{brand}} shoebox with a {{logo}} sits perfectly centered.

sequence.audio: low, deep ambient hum, subtle suspenseful synth pad

sequence.description: The box violently bursts open. Light and energy emanate from within.

camera.movement: quick shake, rapid zoom into the exploding box

sequence.lighting: Intense, cool blue light erupts from the box, casting dynamic shadows.

actions.action: The lid and sides fly apart explosively.

sequence.audio: Sudden bass drop (BOOM), whoosh sound effect, crackling energy.

sequence.description: Objects and structures fly out of the light and assemble the final room.

camera.movement: pulls back to reveal the full room transformation

sequence.lighting: The room is now lit by neon lights and spotlights, glowing with cool energy.

actions.description: Floating shelves holding pairs of {{featured_product}} fly from the center and affix to the walls.
A neon {{brand}} wall light materializes and flickers on.
Holographic posters of athletes flicker into existence on the back wall.

sequence.audio: High-tech assembly sounds, mechanical clicks, electrical hum, upbeat electronic music begins to build.

sequence.description: The final, fully assembled sneaker vault is revealed in a dramatic hero shot.
sequence.lighting: Crisp, cool showroom lighting. Spotlights highlight the shoes.

elements.name: final_room
elements.description: A high-tech {{brand}} sneaker vault, perfectly assembled and glowing.

sequence.audio: Music hits its crescendo and holds, a final resonant synth note.
